definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

sentences.english: Having been dehumanized in turn, they will embrace inhumanity and brutality.
sentences.chinese: 既已被非人化，他们将拥抱非人性和残暴。

sentences.english: Khiva's name became synonymous with cruelty and barbarity in contemporary Britain when, in 1842, two army officers, Colonel Charles Stoddart and Captain Arthur Conolly, were beheaded here in public.
sentences.chinese: 在当代英国，希瓦这个名字是残暴和野蛮的同义词。

sentences.english: The frightened slaves groveled at the feet of their cruel master.
sentences.chinese: 奴隶匍匐在残暴的主人脚下。

sentences.english: Imperial Britain savaged India and Burma.
sentences.chinese: 英帝国残暴地攻击印度和缅甸。

sentences.english: They led the father and son to Gessler, the cruel governor.
sentences.chinese: 他们把泰勒父子领到残暴的总督盖勒面前。

sentences.english: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies or the wicked are cruel.
sentences.chinese: 义人顾惜牲畜的生命主，恶人都是残暴不仁。

sentences.english: While aftershocks from theearthquake continued, the tsunami wreaked the most damage.
sentences.chinese: 虽然震后余震不断，海啸才是最残暴的苦主。

sentences.english: At last the people rose up in arms and defeated the cruel rulers.
sentences.chinese: 人民终于武装起义推翻了残暴的统治者。

sentences.english: At last the slaves mutinied against their cruel masters.
sentences.chinese: 最后奴隶们终于起来反抗他们的残暴的主人。

sentences.english: Jie was extremely tyrannical and dissolute.
sentences.chinese: 桀是个极端残暴，放荡的人。
“他是真正意义上的残暴，”哈迪说。

sentences.english: GALVATRON is a powered up version of MEGATRON making him the epitome of egotistical might and tyranny.
sentences.chinese: 能量强化后的威震天，是骄狂和残暴的化身。

sentences.english: He used his ruthless and destructive armies to despoil everybody who lived within reach of his realm.
sentences.chinese: 他动用其破坏性的军队残暴地掠夺国内的人民。

sentences.english: Pirates were the first people to rebel against this world.
sentences.chinese: 海盗是反抗这个残暴世界的第一人。

sentences.english: In much of Western Europe, he is remembered as the epitome of cruelty and rapacity .
sentences.chinese: 在许多西欧国家，他是残暴和贪婪的象征。

sentences.english: We must all fight against unfairness and cruelty.
sentences.chinese: 我们大家必须与不公正和残暴作斗争。

definition: to be devoid of all humanity/inhuman/bestial
